page.title: 12ST. MIRREN - PAISLEY
page.content: St. Mirren Football Club, founded in 1877, is Paisley's only senior club. Under the management of Alex Ferguson ('Fergy'), the Love St. club were pro- moted to the Premier League in 1977 and have been there ever since. In recent seasons crowds have seriously declined. This has resulted in St. Mirren having to sell some of its best players to meet heavy financial comm- itments. Thus star forward Frank McAvennie has left the club for West- ham, although St. Mirren have signed Frank McGarvie,a former 'Saints' play- er, from Celtic. Post-war highlights include the Scott- ish Cup victory of 1959 and the First Division Championship win in Centenary Year 1977. The Paisley club now look forward to European football next sea- son, having qualified for the U.E.F.A. cup.
